introduction.title: Welcome to Tucan
introduction.description: Delve into the strengths of TUCAN and discover how our technology enhances intelligence operations, giving you a strategic edge in the complex digital landscape. Internet platforms serve as the ideal camouflage for a variety of harmful intentions. To counteract that, we invented Tucan - a sophisticated solution, advanced by artificial intelligence, that can help you seek, collect, & cross-reference data to find exactly what you are looking for

explore.title: We have access...
explore.description: Explore the power of TUCAN, your gateway to advanced OSINT. Our platform integrates multiple data sources, enabling precise digital footprint tracking and profile enrichment. Leveraging AI-driven analytics, we transform complex data sets into actionable intelligence, enhancing strategic decision-making

feature_1.title: Law Enforcement & Intelligence agencies
feature_1.description: By leveraging advanced AI and analytics to analyze public data, we provide real-time insights, support investigations, and uncover hidden connections to enhance operational effectiveness.

feature_2.title: Unparalleled visibility
feature_2.description: We offer unparalleled visibility into digital environments through advanced analytics and integrated data, ensuring real-time monitoring and precise threat detection.

feature_3.title: Ideal for wide web environment
feature_3.description: TUCAN tracks data from a vast number of sources like instant messengers, social media, the darknet, forums, blockchain and many more, providing comprehensive intelligence for proactive investigations.

description.title: Welcome to TUCAN website. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website.

description.text: We only collect personal information that you voluntarily provide through our optional forms. The forms may request the following information:
The information you provide is used for the following purposes:
description.ul_1: To respond to your inquiries and provide the services you request.
description.ul_2: To improve our website and the services we offer.
description.ul_3: To communicate with you about updates and other information related to our services (if you have opted to receive such communications).

description.text: We take the security of your personal information seriously. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties.
By using our website and voluntarily providing your personal information, you consent to our Privacy Policy.
We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we encourage you to review this policy periodically.
If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@2can.online.

content_1.title: Introduction
content_1.description: Welcome to TUCAN. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our website.

description.ul_1: Eligibility: You must be at least 18 years of age to use our website. By using our website, you represent and warrant that you meet this requirement.
description.ul_2: Prohibited Conduct: You agree not to use our website for any unlawful purpose or in any way that could harm, disable, overburden, or impair the website.

description.ul_1: User Content: You retain ownership of any content you submit through our website. By submitting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use your content.
description.ul_2: Prohibited Content: You agree not to submit any content that is offensive, defamatory, obscene, or otherwise objectionable..

description.text: Your use of our website is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information.

All content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of TUCAN or its content suppliers and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use any content from our website without our prior written permission.

Our website is provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that our website will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of viruses or other harmful components.
To the fullest extent permitted by law, TUCAN shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our website.
You agree to indemnify and hold TUCAN harmless from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses arising out of your use of our website or your violation of these Terms and Conditions.

We may update these Terms and Conditions from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and your continued use of our website after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.
If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@2can.online.
